text.p: Secondhand tonnage brokers reported the sale of the following vessels.
BULKERS
Mare Tirreno - (built 1976) 81,880 dwt sold to Greek buyers for $3 million.
Thalia - (built 1976) 30,694 dwt sold to Greek buyers for $3.35 million.
New Venus - (built 1986) 26,914 dwt sold to London based buyers for $9.8 million.
TANKERS
Geneva - (built 1975) 307,235 dwt plus sistership:
Kawasaki - (built 1974) 307,431 dwt sold for 11 million each with three years timecharter to Greek buyers.
Dirk Jacob - (built 1976) 33,788 dwt plus sistership Erika Jacob (built 1975), sold to Italian buyers for $10.9 million enbloc.

Myrina - (built 1995) 298,306 dwt plus sisterships Murex (built 1995), Megara (built 1996), Macoma (built 1995), Magdala (built 1995) sold to European buyers for $87.5 million each with option of seven years bareboat back at $22,000 daily.
Eastern Bliss -(built 1991) 3,022 dwt plus sistership Miyuki (built 1990) 3,016 dwt, sold to Indonesian buyers for $14 million with three to five years timecharter back.
SOLD FOR DEMOLITION
TANKERS
Galp Funchal - (built 1977) sold for $180 per ldt "as is".
BULKERS
Cherry - (built 1968) 25,721 dwt sold to Indian breaker for $170 per ldt.
GENERAL CARGO CARRIER
Eastern Star - (built 1969) 15,090 dwt sold to Indian breakers for $175 per ldt.
Orient Venture - (built 1972) 9,368 dwt sold to Indian breakers for $170 per plt.
GPC VESSEL
Ocean Trader - (built 1973) 11,684 dwt sold to Indian breakers for $182 per plt.
Some of these sales may not be final as they maybe subject to inspection, survey or other conditions before completion.
